text: Claude Leteurtre (born 30 December 1940 in Donville-les-Bains, Manche) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Calvados department, and is a member of the New Centre. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:People from Manche Category:Mayors of places in Normandy Category:Union for French Democracy politicians Category:The Centrists politicians Category:Union of Democrats and Independents politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Claude Leteurtre
